issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

iOS 4.1 4GT iPod touch. Titanium SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/04/11 08:01 e49700d)

1.Phone > Play movie > embedded Video
2.play local all the way through
3.tap into embedded video and watch the placement of the objects on stage

results: the movie is briefly drawn off screen. Does not occur unless you play local first.

{html}
fields.summary: iOS: embedded video briefly plays in the incorrect place after playing local movie

comments.body:
{html}

(from [0dc07b2f45bfcb75eeb8d617dea7209781cd6657]) [#2742 state:fixed-in-qa] Wait until we have a sandbox area to draw the original movie view. Note that this fix should be ported to ALL views but screws with tableview for right now. https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/0dc07b2f45bf...

{html}

{html}

4.2.1 4gt ipod touch, no embedded vid on <3.2 [INFO] Titanium SDK version: 1.6.0 (01/12/11 14:54 ff401e1)

{html}
